channel.title: Client Crashes as soon as I click to Move
channel.description:
My client loads up fine and everything, but when I loggin and click to move somewhere it immediatly crashes and I get this prompt. Please reply if you know how to fix this because it has happened on every source and client I have tried so far.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/zl2kpz.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client Crashes as soon as I click to Move
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

Rsps like x32 bit systems better. Lot of trouble to run on a 64x bit.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Crashes as soon as I click to Move

item.title: Client Crashes as soon as I click to Move
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

You would need to get 32 bit Java instead of 64 bit. That is the most likely solution.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Crashes as soon as I click to Move
